channel.title: 317 HaizScape [Pi] Applicants
channel.description:
[center][img]http://oi50.tinypic.com/es97rm.jpg[/img][/center]
[center]Hello Moparscape, my name is Brent, I've been working on my server HaizScape for quite awhile now and I've been having some troubles lately that are out of my skill range to fix, so I am trying to find some people that can help out and want staff positions on my server. My server is a lot about fun but I also like to focus on economy. HaizScape does have the torva, chaotics, and items like that, but they are not incredibly easy to obtain. I am not into customs at all so there are very very few customs. I am looking for a development team that is willing to work, but have fun in the process. [/center]
[center][b]I am searching for:[/b][/center]
[center]Website Designer/Developer (FILLED)[/center] [center]GFX Designer (GFX such as forum ranks and such, also this person will control the GFX section of the forums.) (FILLED)[/center] [center]Coder: I can code but not extremely well, this coder will need to be able to do the following: Fix the cache downloader - Fix 1 or 2 problems in Castle Wars - Fix a few cache problems (not major, if you can fix the cache downloader these problems should be fixed)[/center] [center][/center]
[center][b]Server Features:[/b][/center]
[center][u][b]Minigames:[/b][/u]
Castle Wars Fight Pits 63 waves of Jad Pest Control Zombies Barrows Duel Arena w/ Staking RFD
[u][b]Skills:[/b][/u]
100% 7+ floors of Dungeoneering 100% Summoning 98% Hunter (Not all NPC's) 95% Farming (Not all plants) 100% other skills
[u][b]Bosses:[/b][/u]
God Wars - Armadyl - Bandos - Saradomin King Black Dragon Dagganoth Kings Tormented Demons Corporal Beast Sea Troll Avatar of Destruction Lakhrahnaz Nex Nomad Giant Sea Snake Balance Element
[u][b]Misc:[/b][/u]
Player Owned Shops Loyalty System Brimhaven Agility Perfect PvP Perfect Hybrid[/center]
[center][b][u]Media:[/u][/b][/center]
[center][img]http://oi50.tinypic.com/zspcb5.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi45.tinypic.com/2w4l2rd.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi49.tinypic.com/24v04ew.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi47.tinypic.com/2mfen42.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi47.tinypic.com/3vfw4.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi48.tinypic.com/24zvomp.jpg[/img]
[img]http://oi45.tinypic.com/9uubsm.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][u][b]Application:[/b][/u][/center]
[center][code]Name: Age: Position you're applying for: Experience:[/code][/center]

item.title: 317 HaizScape [Pi] Applicants
item.dc:creator: @sriahciboon sriahciboon
item.description:
@sriahciboon wrote:

Name: Aaron Starling

Age: 16

Position you’re applying for: Web Designer

Experience: Full Time Web Designer for multiple websites // Experience in coding/developing for Java Development Boards // Minor knowledge with Java,C#,C+,C,Python // Multiple Previous Development teams dating back since I was 13 // I’ve been playing since I was 10.

Note: If not I would also apply for the graphics title.

Read full topic
